name: Erotic girls match 3
description:
Become the Chosen One and help the hot girls get ready for a three-in-a-row puzzle party. Pass the levels. Collect resources, discover the history of hot girls. Each new level will tell you about how to organize parties with hot girls. Have a party right now.

Classic 3-in-a-row Match 3 game
Party with hot girls. The story of one party.
